entries.s_bcb592f: Let me see if you have any blueprints I can work with...
entries.s_aae81853: Let's see what you have to sell...
entries.s_9ed93871: Hello. I can construct a ship chassis for you if you are holding a set of chassis blueprints.
entries.s_93a92e8: How do I assemble a ship?
entries.s_37386aa2: You need to procure a set of chassis blueprints from a Shipwright. Once you have the blueprints, you must come to a chassis dealer to have the chassis built to your specifications.
entries.s_3310c404: You don't have anything to sell me.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (chassis_npc.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
